title: The Brigadier's Daughter
description: Marrying her runaway sister's bridegroom is not quite the fairy-tale wedding Miss Alexandra Packard has always dreamed of! Once the ink is dry on the marriage certificate, the sensible, logical part of her urges her to reveal her identity. The other part—the romantic, womanly, lonely part—keeps her silent.In truth, she does not want the fantasy to end. Indeed, she longs to find out what it would be like to truly be Captain Reid Bowen's wife in every sense of the word….
author: Catherine March
